pkgmetadata.longdescription: OmniLog(R) Phenotype Microarray Example Data // Tools for analysing OmniLog(R) Phenotype Microarray (PM) data as produced by the device distributed by BIOLOG Inc. and similar kinds of data such as growth curves are provided in the opm package. The opmdata package contains the entire example data set from Vaas et al. (2012), which has been removed from opm due to its size, as well as the data sets from Wittmann et al. (2013) and Montero-Calasanz et al. (2013).
